Plot

The ancient people want a king to watch him toward liberation and glory, as they announced the prophets.
Jesus of Nazareth, the Messiah, promised, walking, working, preaching, stimulates the apostles to spread his message, he deals with religious and social themes; the powerful fear his words and organize themselves to decree its death. Jesus allows himself to murderous violence that led him to the cross and the resurrection.
